actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Federal Communications Commission to enforce certain requirements of objectivity with respect to the Corporation for Public Broadcasting.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to authorize the Federal Communications Commission to enforce the requirement of objectivity and balance imposed on the Corporation for Public Broadcasting with respect to the funding of programs of a controversial nature to be produced by such Corporation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Federal Communications Commission to enforce certain requirements of objectivity with respect to the Corporation for Public Broadcasting.
